data.features#Features:
Powerful Virtualization ‚Äì ProxLink leverages Proxmox VE‚Äôs intuitive web interface to efficiently manage virtual machines and containers, ensuring flexibility and scalability.
Robust Network Security ‚Äì The lab integrates pfSense firewall/router capabilities, delivering advanced security features, VPN connectivity, and comprehensive network monitoring.
Seamless Remote Access ‚Äì TailScale provides secure, reliable remote connectivity within the lab environment, with minimal setup and low-maintenance operation.
Reliable Storage Management ‚Äì TrueNAS is used for data organization, advanced snapshotting, redundancy, and secure file-sharing, enhancing overall data resilience. (In-Progress)
Extensible and Customizable ‚Äì ProxLink offers extensibility through scripting, automation, thorough documentation, and powerful integrations, allowing flexible customization.
Optimized for Learning and Growth ‚Äì The project is structured to provide a practical, accessible learning environment suitable for all skill levels, from beginners to experienced IT professionals.

data.what-is-proxlink#What is ProxLink?: ProxLink is more than just a project, ProxLink is my exploration into building a versatile home lab using open-source technologies like Proxmox, pfSense, Tailscale, and TrueNAS. It enables me to test cybersecurity concepts, virtualized environments, networking strategies, and software integrations securely and conveniently at home.
